duration.description: Number of minutes the gear was deployed. Known as DU

unit_of_time.description: The unit of time for measuring gear deployment. NLD: ET

fishing_operations.description: Number of fishing operations per 24 hour period: number of times gear is shot - does not apply to hooks, lines and pots. If no fishing operations took place then report 0. Known as FO

fishing_depth.description: Fishing depth. The distance from the water surface to the lowest part of the fishing gear, measured in meters. Applies to vessels working under deep sea permit and using towed gear, long lines or fixed nets. Known as FD

gear_component_count.description: Additional information relating to certain gear types e.g. liners = hooks, dredger = number of dredges. GBR: GBRFOX

gear_specification.description: Norwegian requirement - gear specification (trawls: 1=single, 2=double, 3=triple). GBR: GBRGS

gear_problems.description: Norwegian requirement - gear problems (1=empty net, 2=net burst, 3=net split, 4=broken meshes, 5=lost gear, 6=other). GBR: GBRGP

gill_net.description: Deep Sea Permit requirements when using gill nets

gear_capacity.description: The capacity or dimensions of the deployed gear. NLD: GC

gear_hook_count.description: Additional information relating to certain gear types: liners = hooks. NLD: NH

gear_dredger_count.description: Additional information relating to certain gear types: dredger = number of dredges. NLD: NN

gear_shot.description: All gear shot event details. NLD: GES, GBR: GES

gear_retrieve.description: All gear retrieve even details. NLD: GER, GBR: GER

gear_loss.description: All gear loss even details. NLD: GLS, GBR: GLS

partnered_fishing_vessel.description: Details of partner vessels for pair fishing. BR: PFP, NLD: NLSPN
